Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
After that, the same exchange happened at the supermarket.
It was awkward, and I couldn't go to that shopping street for a while.
...Well, if you say it's cute because of the cat, then okay.
[Vanilla]: "Huh? Kunchun, kunchun..."
[Vanilla]: "There's a really nice smell coming from over there."
[Chocola]: "That's true, it's a very fragrant and pleasant smell, Master!"
[Kashou Minaduki]: "Indeed. This scent is..."
Facing the direction of the smell.
[Neko Stall Owner]: "Welcome!"
[Neko Stall Owner]: "How about some freshly made takoyaki?"
[Neko Stall Owner]: "It's hot and full of bonito flakes, how about it?"
[Chocola]: "Wow, a cat's takoyaki stall! That's rare, Master!"

Question:

[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "I hope you become a good child!"

Vanilla: "Shigure, it's strict. But thanks to you, I've learned a lot."

Store Owner: "Is that so? You're a kind master."

Chocola: "Ah, but you are your master!"

Chocola: "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?"

Vanilla: "Translation: Shigure is an important friend."

Vanilla: "Calling you 'Master' is only for this Master."

Store Owner: "Hehe. Are you loved, Master?"

Kashou: "Well, it's a privilege."

(Slightly prodded with the elbow.)

Responds with a embarrassed half-smile.

...It's a bit embarrassing outside.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。

当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure stared at the merciless electronic sound of her mobile phone.

...I thought contacting Shigure would solve everything right away, but...

Chocola: "Hmm, mmm, delicious breakfast!"

Chocola: "Master's meals are always delicious♪"

Vanilla: "Shokora, ketchup on your cheek."

Vanilla: "Artfully cute. I'll lick it off for you. Lick-lick."

The person themselves were happily munching on a sandwich.

By the way, it was filled with tomato, cheese, and lettuce.

It was a simple dish with a semi-cooked egg tucked inside.

If it's breakfast, that's about what you'd expect.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Yes, well..."
Receiving the receipt and pen.
Minaduki Kashou: "...It seems that what I ordered is different."
The restaurant employee: "...Huh, really?"
The restaurant employee: "...Does that mean the items are different?"
Minaduki Kashou: "No, it looks like what I ordered is still there..."
Looking at the cardboard boxes stacked inside.
A small store filled with piles and piles of cardboard boxes.
Rather than being filled with food items, the store was almost entirely made up of cardboard boxes.
Minaduki Kashou: "As you can see, we don't need that many dishes here..."
The restaurant employee: "...I'm sorry! I'll check with headquarters right away!"
The restaurant employee: "Would it be alright if I take a little while to confirm?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
```
[Servant]: "It seems that there was a mix-up with the order form, and this one has gotten mixed in..."
[Servant]: "Lord Minaduki will likely need something soon as well..."
[Servant]: "If it's okay, I would like you to receive your ordered dishes..."
[Kashou]: "Receive the ordered items...?"
[Kashou]: "...Huh? From these?"
A towering stack of cardboard boxes.
Words get stuck in my throat.
They're all identical boxes.
I don't know what's inside until I open them.
And looking at the labels, they're all top-notch tea sets and dishes.
So if you don't handle them with utmost care, things could go terribly wrong.
[Kashou]: "Well, there is also preparation for opening today, so if you can get it to me today, that would be great..."
[Kashou]: "...It'll take a long time to unpack all of this from here, won't it?"
```

reference_answer:

I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.

[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」

バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.

Master Kashou: "Chocola, if you're feeling tired, would you like to take a short break?"
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just a little..."
Chocola: "But it's okay. I'm sorry for worrying you, Master."
Master Kashou: "...There's no need to apologize."
With a troubled smile and lowering her head.
I know exactly why you're not feeling well.
So there's nothing I can do but stay silent.

Vanilla: "Then I'll go buy some drinks."
Master Kashou: "Ah, thank you. For everyone."

Giving Vanilla some coins and prompting Chocola to sit on the bench.
The sea breeze that often blows gently stirs the trees in the park.

Shigure: "But cats are intelligent creatures. They can become part of a human family, partner, etc."
Shigure: "...That's why..."
Taking a deep breath,
She smiles with a troubled expression and looks at me.
Shigure: "...I think it would be sad if I couldn't rely on myself either?"
Her smile pains my chest.

携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。

reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure squints at the screen of her phone.
She looks at Kashou, who isn't moving yet, and guesses where the call is from.
[Kashou]: "It's probably from home. Hurry up."
[Shigure]: "...I understand even without a specific reason. I came out without telling my destination."
Shigure tightly grips her phone as it stops ringing.
Like Shigure, Kashou remains silent,
clenching his phone tightly.
[Shigure]: "...Is it because I'm still an inexperienced girl?"
[Shigure]: "Or is it because I'm a clueless child?"
[Shigure]: "...So, do I have to obey what my parents say?"
[Shigure]: "...I want to stay here."
[Shigure]: "...At least be by my brother's side when he's suffering..."

何とかそれだけを口にする。

reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
My mind hasn't caught up to the unexpected scene since morning.
Shigure: "Good morning, elder brother."
Shigure: "I have thought a lot about this incident."
A cheerful smile without any clouds.
Other cats are also smiling at me in the same way.
While feeling the cold sweat running down my back,
Kashou: "Haa... What do you mean when you say 'thought'?"
Somehow, I only manage to say that.
Shigure: "From this incident, it has become clear that it is not reasonable for elder brother to overdo it."
Shigure: "However, as my younger sister, I also caused you endless worry at night..."
Shigure: "Therefore, Shigure thinks that increasing the staff will be the best way to reduce elder brother's burden."
Kashou: "Haa..."

reference_answer:

Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.

This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.

[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」

[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」

I am tense and stiffen my body.
The cats also held their breath.
[Suhama]: "......Hmph."
This man is my father - Minaduki Suhama.

[Shigure]: "W-Well, that's not..."

[CocoNuts]: "Oh, Father, welcome back!"
[Suhama]: "Hmph"
[Maple]: "...Isn't this dangerous?"

[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」

俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？

[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?

[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」

Shigure: "If you taste it, you should understand how seriously Kashou is working on it!"
I couldn't help but hold my breath. Would my father eat the cake I made?

鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」

Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
I said that and left the Kashiou house, as if I was running away.
Various thoughts were swirling in my head, making it hard to think clearly.
Before I knew it, I found myself in the night park.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Ah..."
I had put all my belongings, including the house key and wallet, into my bag and left them behind.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "...What am I doing?"
[Chocola]: "...Master"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Shokora...!"
[Vanilla]: "Master, you forgot something."
Vanilla was holding my bag in her hand.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Did you bring it back for me, Vanilla?"
[Vanilla]: "Of course. Sleeping outside is troublesome."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "That's right."
Without a key, not only couldn't I get into the house, but two others wouldn't be able to either.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
I had something to ask from my suppliers. It's not urgent, but it would be better if I could call them sooner.

I think it's normal for a personal bakery to handle such things, but I personally negotiate with each of my suppliers.

There are also farmers who sell ingredients that aren't generally available in large quantities.

The quest for flavor was also a journey to find ingredients.

It wouldn't be appropriate to discuss work while everyone is enjoying the tour, so I said I had some private matters and left the room.

For safety, I decided to go outside the inn and talk somewhere quiet.

I made a call.

[Minaduki Kashou]: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"

[Minaduki Kashou]: "Phew..."

The order from abroad surprised the other party, but it seems they will manage to send it out somehow.

I returned to the inn.

Vanilla: "Hehe... I'm not saying I'm serious about it."

Maple: "No way!? No, that can't be..."

Maple: "I was surprised Vanilla is surprisingly skilled, but I should still be faster than you."

Vanilla: "...Oh, Cinnamon is calling."

Maple: "Huh?"

As Maple looked away for a moment---

Vanilla: "There's an opening!"

With a sharp sound, the ball bounced and Vanilla served aces.

Vanilla: "Victory."

できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。

[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。

[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.

With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.

やはり、眠れそうにない。
俺は音を立てないように気をつけつつ、部屋を出た。
宿は常夜灯があるが、そこを離れると田舎の夜だ。
場所によっては、自分の足元さえわからないほどの暗闇が広がっている。
昼間は観光客で賑わっている温泉街も、深夜となると、すっかり雰囲気が違っている。
橋から下を眺める。
暗闇だ。
川の流れる水音だけがしていた。
川面に映った月が見えそう……いや、あれは街灯の光か？
確かめようと、俺は橋の下を覗きこんだ。

Yeah, I don't think I can get to sleep.
I exit the room, careful not to make a sound on the way out.
The inn has its lamps on at night, but once I leave the area, I'm greeted by rural darkness.
Depending on the spot, it's dark enough that I can't even tell where it is I'm standing.
This hot spring district is usually bustling with tourists during the day, but in the wee hours of the night, it has a completely different atmosphere.
I peer down from the bridge.
Darkness.
All I can hear is the sound of the running river.
I feel I can make out the moon's reflection on the water's surface... No, wait, is that just a street light?
I peer deeper below the bridge to confirm.
ModelAnswer:

[CocoNuts]: "Nyamcha... onee hyaan... sore, boku no omanjuu... nyaa"

[Shigure]: "Suu... suu..."

Still, I don't seem to be sleepy.

I made sure not to make a sound and left the room.

The inn has a lamp that stays on all night, but once you leave it, it's the countryside night.

Depending on the place, there's such darkness that even your own feet are unknown.

Even the hot spring town bustling with tourists during the day changes completely at midnight.

Looking down from the bridge.

It's pitch dark.

Only the sound of flowing water from the river remained.

I could see the moon reflected on the surface of the river... no, was it the light from the street lamp?

To check, I peered under the bridge.

Question:

[アズキ]: 「嘉祥の今までのことって？」
[嘉祥]: 「……大学卒業後に、俺はフランス留学をした」
[嘉祥]: 「卒業して、何の選択肢もなく家業を継ぐのが、どうにも釈然としなくて。自分の見識を広げたかったんだ」

reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Because you didn't put on outside shoes. That's not normal for a walk this late at night, don't you think?」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」
ModelAnswer:
Azuki: "I didn't have any outer shoes, right? It's not normal to be out at night like this."

Kashou: "I'm sorry... I really needed a change of pace."

Azuki: "Still worried about the convenience store sweets?"

Kashou: "No, no, it's definitely okay now."

Kashou: "But thinking back on everything... I wonder what's lacking in me."

Azuki: "What about Kashou's past?"

Kashou: "...After graduating from university, I studied in France."

Kashou: "I couldn't shake the feeling that just taking over the family business without any options was wrong. I wanted to broaden my horizons."

Kashou: "Just so you understand... It's not that I dislike water moon sweets, right?"

"It's the day when Japanese sell the most cakes—actually, it's on the night of the 24th—the Christmas Eve."

Even though we have an appointment...I still feel nervous.

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Where I studied abroad is close to here, so it's got a lot of nostalgia for me. Kind of like I'm back for the first time in a while.」

[Kashou]: 「Yeah, a few minutes down this street, in fact.」

Kashou: "...Is that what you mean?"
Kashou: "Well, since my study abroad location is nearby, I feel nostalgic. It feels like coming home."
Shigure: "Your brother's study abroad location is near here, isn't it?"
Kashou: "Ah, just a few minutes' walk down this street."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「フランスでは、食事のときにケーキを食べるのは、ごく普通のことだ」

どのくらい皿数を出すかは、各家庭によるが。
[時雨]: 「毎日がフランス料理ですね」

[時雨]: 「ふむふむ……なるほど……」

[時雨]: 「言われてみれば……！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Kashou]: "In France, eating cake during meals is a very common thing."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Even in regular households, dinner usually consists of salad, soup, bread, fish dishes, meat dishes, cheese, and dessert..."
The number of plates varies depending on the household.
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Every day is French cuisine, isn't it?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "That's why eating cake almost every day isn't so uncommon."
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Hmm hmm... I see..."
[Minaduki Shigure]: "It feels a bit strange to have courses in your own home."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "No, no... Japanese home cooking is like kaiseki to people from other countries."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat/fish... The number of plates isn't that different, right?"
[Minaduki Shigure]: "You're right..."

[Kashou]: 「Yes...」

Something dad and Mentor both understand.
However, it's not something that can be explained in words.
[Kashou]: 「Unghh...」
I find myself lost with my thoughts running around in circles in my head.
[Beignet]: 「I told you that I wouldn't do you any good, didn't I? Why not get back to Japan while you still can?」

Probably, there's something lacking in me.
And both my father and mentor understand this.
But it's not something explainable with words.

**Minaduki Kashou:** "Uuuu..."

Frustrated by his thoughts, Minaduki's mind began to spin again.

**Beignet:** "I said I'm useless, didn't I? Shall we head back home now?"

**Minaduki Kashou:** "Ah, no! I can't go back until I find something."

[Beignet]: 「Tee hee hee... One less worry, then.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... So, this is the type of girl Shigure is. I'm glad I've gotten to meet her.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "No, it's dangerous to take a walk after the sun sets."
Kashou: "That's true. Since we have a large bed, it should be fine."
Shigure: "…………What!?"
Kashou: "If Shigure doesn't like it, then it's a different story."
Shigure: "H-hmph……H-hmph……With my brother……!?"
Shigure: "Ugh……I'm so happy that I might faint from happiness."
Beignet: "……Are you really okay, Kashou?"
Kashou: "Shigure sometimes acts like this, but she's definitely fine. Trust me, mentor."
Beignet: "Hehehe…then, I'm relieved."
Beignet: "That's right……Shigure is a girl like this. It was nice to meet her."

Question:

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "If you say so..."
Shigure: "If you don't open the windows and dust every day, mold will start to smell quickly."
Kashou: "Is that what it is?"
Shigure: "My brother's room at home is perfectly maintained by me, so I clean it daily."
Shigure: "I open the windows, air out the room, wipe down the desk, and check the comfort of the bed every day."
Kashou: "So, you do that..."
The comfort of the bed needs to be checked every day...?
Shigure: "Perhaps Beignet has been waiting for his brother to come back all this time."
Kashou: "I see..."

reference_answer:

[Shigure]: 「Nya~oh♪ Nyaoh? Nya-ohm.」

[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」
[Shigure]: 「You are too kind. Especially considering I tagged along of my own accord.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:

Minaduki Shigure: "Yes."

Minaduki Shigure: "Sorry. I was so happy that I forgot human speech."

Minaduki Shigure: "That's a waste of words. I came by myself after all."
Minaduki Kashou: "It's okay... even I came by myself."

Question:

[Shigure]: 「Hah... Hah.. Nii-sama, are you already asleep?」
[Kashou]: 「...Uh, no, not yet.」

[Kashou]: 「...Speaking of which, I wonder how they're all doing.」
[Shigure]: 「Perhaps I should have employed a pet-sitter after all.」
ModelAnswer:

Minaduki Shigure: "Ha... Ha... Has my brother already gone to sleep?"
Kashou: "...No, not yet."
Minaduki Shigure: "...I heard from Maple that you've been having trouble sleeping lately."
Kashou: "That's right. When I'm alone, I end up thinking about a lot of things."
Minaduki Shigure: "But now, you're not alone, are you?"
Kashou: "Ah... I know."
Minaduki Shigure: "I'm here. And Benjiet-san, Fraise, and... the cats are waiting too, right?"
Kashou: "...Speaking of which, are the cats doing well?"
Minaduki Shigure: "Indeed, we should have hired a pet sitter after all."

[Kashou]: 「Your nose is bleeding...?」
Shigure rises up, fixes her disheveled pajamas, and staggers her way to the shower room.

Kashou: "What happened, Shigure!? Did you catch a cold!?"
Shigure: "I-I'm fine... It's just that I was too amazed by you..."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I've been working longer than you, but it seems like Fraise is more efficient."
Fraise: "Master Minaduki is meticulous even in the smallest details. I want to learn from you."
Minaduki Kashou: "Really?"

Question:

俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...

We were supposed to leave tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is 7 hours. To return home after the three days as planned, I had to leave earlier.

In the end, there was still something missing in myself that I didn't understand.

Emotionally, I've become much easier...

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」

Minaduki Kashou: "But coming here and helping the shop reminded me..."

Minaduki Kashou: "The cakes made by Master are really delicious, with a gentle taste... they bring smiles to people."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」

[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」

[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」

Beignet: "...Yes."

Beignet: "Haha... really?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Then, what's the reason for becoming a pastry chef?"
Beignet: "...This shop has been around since my grandmother's time, and we've always made cakes."
Beignet: "Not as much as Kashou's family, but I think there is a tradition to protect."

[Chocola]: "Does Master's financier taste different from yours?"
[Kashou]: "That's true. The ingredients used are different, and if everything were imported from France, it would be priced like a luxury store."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Wow, is this a Christmas present!? Thank you very much, Mother!"

Awayuki: "It might be a bit early, but Kashou might get angry and leave again, right?"

Shigure: "..."

Kashou: "No, I don't have any today! Trust me."

Awayuki: "Yes, even for Kashou."

Kashou: "Ah, yes... thank you."

Awayuki: "Want to open it?"

I opened the wrapping paper and the small box as instructed.

Kashou: "...Photo frame?"

It seems there are no photos inside.

Awayuki: "Do you think it would be fun to decorate one of this year's memories on the wall in your room?"

Thinking back, I remember that Shigure gave a present like this for my birthday because Mother wanted something.

[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃんの一番大切な思い出に……わたしも写って……はぁはぁ……うっ」
[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
Cinnamon: "Master's! A, but, which photo should I... um..."
Cinnamon: "Ah, the one from La Soleil's opening celebration. The photo with Master and Vanilla!"
Vanilla: "That's good choice. I'll do the same."
Maple: "What should I do?"
Cinnamon: "Isn't that a good idea? When we sang together on the boat?"
Cinnamon: "I also took photos, not just videos, right?"
Maple: "Ah..."
Maple: "...Yes. It feels a bit embarrassing, but"
Maple: "That's the most precious memory I have from this year."
Cinnamon: "In Maple-chan's most precious memories... I'm in it too... ha ha... um..."
Maple: "Huh? But it's just a photo of me alone..."
